DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study Dendritic Cell Vaccine HIV-1 Infected Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This randomized trial evaluate whether mRNA-transfected dendritic cell vaccination safe immunogenic HIV-infected participant antiretroviral therapy .
DOC.criteria: HIV1 positive CD4+ T Cell count > 200 Undetectable HIV viral load 6 month prior screen On antiretroviral treatment 12 month prior screen Hepatitis C positive Detectable HIV viral load within 6 month prior study entry Females pregnant nursing
